queryCondition.queryText:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where Timestamp > ago(1h)
| where RegistryKey contains "Run"
| where isnotempty(RegistryValueData)
| project Timestamp, DeviceName, RegistryKey, RegistryValueName, RegistryValueData, InitiatingProcessFileName, DeviceId, ReportId

alertTemplate.title: Suspicious Registry Autostart Modification
alertTemplate.description:
A modification was made to Windows autostart registry keys. This is a common 
persistence technique used by malware to maintain access to the system 
across reboots.
